alert.note: Alert for Anoka (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 10:41AM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin and Minnesota... Mississippi River near Hastings L/D 2 affecting Dakota, Washington, Pierce and Goodhue Counties. Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. South Fork Crow River below Mayer affecting Carver County. Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Sherburne, Stearns and Wright Counties. Rum River near St. Francis affecting Anoka County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rum River near St. Francis. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 AM CDT Wednesday, the stage was 9.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 930 AM CDT Wednesday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.6 feet on 04/06/1986. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
